News.headline: Free Female Football At Barking Mosque hosted by Dagenham & Redbridge's Community Trust
News.page_title: Free Female Football At Barking Mosque hosted by Dagenham & Redbridge's Community Trust
News.short_description: Dagenham and Redbridge's Community Trust will now be hosting free female football at Barking Mosque
News.description:
Dagenham and Redbridge FC Community Trust in partnership with MSA and Al-Madina Mosque are aiming to get more females playing football by providing a safe and secure environment which does not compromise religious beliefs.

Starting Friday 27th January from 7:30pm till 8:30pm, the Dagenham & Redbridge Community Trust will be running female football sessions at Barking Mosque.

For more info or to book a place please contact Yashmin on info@muslimahsports@gmail.com
